title: Rapha One More City Collection proceeds will fund secondary cancer research
content:
Rapha have partnered with Christine O’Connell, founder of secondary breast cancer charity One More City. The partnership has resulted in the new One More City Collection of road cycling apparel for men and women, the proceeds of which will go directly to funding secondary cancer research. Rapha One More City Collection For several years now […]

The post Rapha One More City Collection proceeds will fund secondary cancer research appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
